chara.textHome: U-umm! I'm Kaede Akino!

I love animals and, er...plants and nature.
I look after the pets at school, and,
um, I help the vegetables grow...
Oh! Y-yeah, I grow v-vegetables at home!
And I've got a lot of pets!
L-like, a snake and, um, a spider!
W-wait...do you not like those?

I thought...it was fine to just run away
from everything that I wasn't good at...

I didn't know how good it felt to
overcome my problems!
I can get...stronger than this?
I can be just like the other girls...
This really opened my eyes!

A-and I don't mean I've been daydreaming,
okay?
I...want to do whatever I can!
I'm still not very good...
But maybe someday I will be!

It'd be nice to be tough enough that
Rena and Momoko could rely on me...

Being in a team with Momoko and Rena
is probably the only thing I'm proud of
about myself...
I still don't have much self-confidence.

But when I remember I'm part of the team,
it eases my nerves.
H-hello!

Um... I-I wanted to say hi to you
without clamming up like this, but...
Then, as I was waiting...I got all nervous...
Good morning!

It's almost time to feed Pero.
Let me defrost Pero's food...

Pero's scales are so cool to the touch.
It's really nice!
It looks like Pero's in a good mood today.
Give it a pet!

I stopped by the market on my way home
and picked up some vegetable seeds.
They had some I've never seen before!
I need to get dinner ready for Hachan.
It's nice that I don't need to defrost it, but...
Unfortunately it often flies away...

I have to clean out the animal hutch in the
morning. That's why I always go to bed early.
The rabbits at school are so cute!
Oh no! It's almost time to leave...
But...I haven't gotten ready at all!
We...we have to...fight, right?

I...I know it's weird for a Magical Girl like me
to say something like that...
I'm still so bad at those claw machines...

I used tons of money trying to
get the prize, but I left with nothing...

I heard that a traveling reptile zoo will
be stopping by near school this weekend!

I've heard of regular traveling zoos, but
one specializing in reptiles is pretty rare!

One day, I'd like to be able to make a
dinner using only vegetables I grew myself!

Things you grow yourself
always taste so much better!

Because of my wish, they stopped building
that new apartment in front of my house.
It might've been selfish to wish for that,

but I love how our house is always
bathed in sunlight…
This is the black tea my mom sells...

I thought it might be fun to
have some together!
It has no additives whatsoever!

Momoko said that people always tell her not
to butt into other people's business...
But if she hadn't been there for me...
I wouldn't be where I am now.
I'm gonna go to Blossom again soon!
I wonder if they have any new flowers.

Blossom is the flower shop where 
Konomi works, remember?
Umm...
I'm s-so sorry!
The Ghost Flower Girl...was really just us!
I won't give out any more flowers!

I invited Rena and Momoko to the
reptile zoo, but they both said no...

Am I the only one who wants to 
go to the reptile zoo?
Wh-what do I do?!
I won...right?
What a relief…
Wow! Amazing!
I…I can do it too!
I-I'm, er...K-Kaede Akino!
Uhh...I go to school here and, um...
I didn't say anything...weird, did I?

E-even little girls like me...
can get a bit stronger, can't they?

I...I think I'm getting some of that
fighting spirit!
Ah! N-no, that's a lie!
Ah, I took way too long, didn't I?
Y-you're...probably mad at me...

It's really, REALLY hard to be a
Magical Girl...

But...if I work and work at it, and keep
working really hard... maybe I'll improve,
just a little?

What does being a Magical Girl
mean to me?

I guess... It's the trials I've been
running from 'til now.

Trials where you always face up to things,
even the stuff that's difficult,
so you can grow...
